findings.title: One Token Holder can paralyze the Bridge Contract
findings.description: A token holder can prevent transaction processing by not approving a token in the Bridge Contract, causing the nonce to not increase and paralyzing the Bridge Contract.

findings.title: Unintended Behavior in checkAndCallSafeTransfer()
findings.description: In ServiceChainToken#checkAndCallSafeTransfer() and ServiceChainNFT#checkAndCallSafeTransfer(), it is executed even if _bridge is not the address of Contract, leading to unintended behavior.

findings.title: Unintended NFT Minting
findings.description: ServiceChainNFT#mintToBridge() can be called by an unintended address, allowing NFTs to be minted freely.

findings.title: Service chain providers are vulnerable to DoS attacks by malicious users
findings.description: The Service Chain Provider can be exploited by malicious users, leading to a denial-of-service (DoS) attack.

findings.title: Insecure Access Modifier of ServiceChainNFT#safeTransferAndCall()
findings.description: The access modifier of ServiceChainNFT#safeTransferAndCall() is public, which may lead to unintended usage and potential security risks.

findings.title: Unintended Behavior in Bridge#chargeWithoutEvent()
findings.description: Reverting when the amount of KLAY deposited is 0 to prevent unintended behavior.

findings.title: Token Owner mistakenly mints the NFTs of the same ID to different users on different chains (Main Chain, Service Chain)
findings.description: The Token Owner may mint the NFTs of the same ID to different users on different chains (Main Chain, Service Chain) due to a lack of prevention mechanism.

findings.title: Unintended Execution of checkAndCallSafeTransfer()
findings.description: In ServiceChainToken#checkAndCallSafeTransfer() and ServiceChainNFT#checkAndCallSafeTransfer(), it is executed even if _bridge is not the address of Contract, leading to unintended behavior.

findings.title: Insufficient Input Validation
findings.description: The amount of KLAY to be deposited is not validated, allowing zero or negative values.
